```{r}
library(readr)
library(magrittr)
library(dplyr)
library(sp)
library(gstat)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
camada <- read_csv('../data/camada.csv', locale = locale(decimal_mark = ','), na = '-', comment = 'unidade')
observacao <- read_csv('../data/observacao.csv', locale = locale(decimal_mark = ','), na = '-', comment = 'unidade')
plot(observacao[, c("coord_x", "coord_y")])
```

```{r}
pts <- 
  merge(observacao, camada, by = 'observacao_id') %>% 
  filter(observacao_id != 'ACC-perfil-2008')
```

```{r}
coordinates(pts) <- ~ coord_x + coord_y
```

```{r}
plot(variogram(c_ ~ 1, pts, cloud = TRUE, cutoff = Inf))
```
